name: The Vampire Diarrhea
description:
Stefano Cagatore drinks blood everynight, but he suffers of hemoglobin intolerance, he can´t stop drinking the red floyd and he can´t stop the vampire Diarrhea

The game contains small playable intro and 15 levels
5 objects are hidden in the game, can you find´em?

Medals and points for your collection

Use arrows to move, up to jump and down to drop down from white and black platforms.
Esc to go back to menu level select

If you need any help check 
https://munguiavideojuegos.blogspot.com/2018/09/el-vampiro-con-diarrea-pixel-201...
